name: 毛紹綱
objective:
本課程以微波電路組件與平面型天線為兩大主軸，深入介紹各個議題如何分析、設計、製作與量測，並著重於它在新一代無線通訊系統中扮演的角色與應用。
中文概述
1.微帶線電路特性
2.共面波導電路特性
3.共面帶線電路特性
4.各式傳輸線結構之轉接
5.新式平面型電路組件
6.高頻電路量測技術
7.微帶天線設計
8.寬頻天線設計
9.天線陣列設計
10.天線參數量測
schedule:
1. Electromagnetic and Transmission Line Theories
2.Planar Guided Structures
3. Coupled Mode Theory
4. Coupled Line Analysis
5. Planar Circuit Components
6. Planar Integrated Antennas
7. Final Report and Discussion
materials:
1. 自編講義
2. K. C. Gupta, R. Garg, I Bahl and P. Bhartia, Microstrip Lines and Slotlines, 2nd ed., Artech House 1996.
3. Rajesh Mongia, Inder J. Bahl, Prakash Bhartia., RF and microwave coupled-line circuits,  Artech House 1999.
4. related papers and reports.
